posts.title: Hello World
posts.text: Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub. Quick StartCreate a new post1$ hexo new "My New Post" More info: Writing Run server1$ hexo server More info: Server Generate static files1$ hexo generate More info: Generating Deploy to remote sites1$ hexo deploy More info: Deployment

posts.title: 电脑常用软件工具清单
posts.text: 常用软件 NoteExpress 网易云音乐 PotPlayer 网易邮箱大师 CAJ Viewer HoneyView Vmware MathType 6 PyCharm Everything TeamViewer Ccleaner Bandizip MATLAB Anaconda 3 Python 3.6 Visual Studio Code Keras Jupyter Notebook OneDrive for business OneNote 百度网盘 Edge/ Chrome/ Firefox Adobe Acrobat Pro Free Download Manager F.lux Snipaste Microsoft Office islide插件（Powerpoint) Onetastic插件（OneNote） Microsoft Visio TexLive Listen1 Listary http://www.listary.com MobaXterm https://mobaxterm.mobatek.net/ scrcpy 安卓投屏工具 小黄条：待办记事工具 http://www.yynote.cn/ 快贴：无需局域网，联网同步剪贴板 https://clipber.com/ copytranslator：翻译软件 Microsoft Remote Desktop (UWP)：已经支持复制粘贴，支持多个会话的管理，缩放，速度快，连接稳定 Chrome插件 屏蔽百度推广 AdGuard: 屏蔽广告 OneNote Clipper Infinity 新标签页 Google Keep 简悦 SimpleRead GitHub sourcegraph,GitZip for GitHub 油猴脚本 沙拉查词：单词查询和翻译 Session Budy：网页TAB保留记录 WebClipper：支持语雀，onenote等 书签：不错的书签工具，可以在网页右侧显示 Free Download Manager插件 NoteExpress插件
